title: Modern Analog Clock AW-7
summary: modern watch face for android wear
description: Round and square watch faces for Android Wear device. The application supports 12/24 time format and all languages to show the current date.To control watch face appearence just touch on it: * Top left corner: color or black dial mode; * Top right corner: show date and digital clock on/off; * Bottom left corner: change colors by round. There are 14 kinds of colors. * Bottom right color: set round or square shape for watch (only for square devices).
descriptionHTML:
Round and square watch faces for Android Wear device. The application supports 12/24 time format and all languages to show the current date.
To control watch face appearence just touch on it:
* Top left corner: color or black dial mode;
* Top right corner: show date and digital clock on/off;
* Bottom left corner: change colors by round. There are 14 kinds of colors.
* Bottom right color: set round or square shape for watch (only for square devices).
comments: Didn't work on Sony SW2 Waste of time!
